mapper.select: select ec.id, ec.title, ec.cover, ec.lesson_num as lessonNum, ecd.description, es.title as oneSubject, es_2.title as twoSubject, et.name as teacherName, et.avatar as teacherAvatar, et.intro as teacherIntro, ec.price from edu_course ec left outer join edu_course_description ecd on ec.id = ecd.id left outer join edu_subject es on ec.subject_parent_id = es.id left outer join edu_subject es_2 on ec.subject_id = es_2.id left outer join edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id = et.id where ec.id = #{id}

select ec.id, ec.title, ec.price, ec.lesson_num as lessonNum, ec.cover, ec.buy_count, ec.view_count, ecd.description, et.id as teacherId, et.name as teacherName, et.intro as teacherIntro, et.avatar as teacherAvatar, es.id as subjectParentId, es.title as subjectParentName, ess.id as subjectId, ess.title as subjectName from edu_course ec join edu_course_description ecd on ec.id = ecd.id join edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id = et.id join edu_subject es on ec.subject_parent_id = es.id join edu_subject ess on ec.subject_id = ess.id where ec.id = #{id}
